doc:
Geri Hoo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geri_Hoo 0 Geraldine "Geri" Hoo Dwellers (1939 - Dec. 29, 2007) was an American actress and beauty pageant contestant who was second runner up in the 1958 Miss Universe contest as a representative of Hawaii. Hoo had a minor part in the 1962 film Confessions of an Opium Eater. Geraldine_"_Geri_"_Hoo_Dwellers ( 1939 - Dec._29_,_2007 ) was an_American_actress_and_beauty_pageant_contestant who was second_runner up in the_1958_Miss_Universe_contest as a_representative of Hawaii . Hoo had a_minor_part in the_1962_film_Confessions of an_Opium_Eater .
